name: Second Coming: Tactical Training
description: Fast paced Sci-Fi FPS - with multiple game modes. Team play, all out war, and capture the flag options to keep the game play fast and furious on all EIGHT maps. Timed map reloads, 9 weapon choices, running on the Unity engine for speed and compatibility.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz or AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.5 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 440 or AMD Radeon HD 5850 or Intel HD Graphics 4000 with 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectXÂ®-compatible
